content:
Springfield is a common city name in many countries, so I'll need a bit more information to give you an accurate answer. Could you please tell me which state or country your Springfield is in?

Springfield is a city name that appears in many states in the United States, such as Illinois, Massachusetts, Missouri, Ohio, and others. Without more information, it's difficult for me to provide a list of modern art museums specific to your city.

If you could provide more context or clarify which Springfield you're referring to, I'd be happy to try and assist you with a list of notable modern art museums in your area.
